item.title: Asbury Park Haiku
item.description: Cinnabar dragonflies do a duet … mirrored below in the lake’s placid face. Plastic Coke sign turned white by sun. Cute bathing suit suddenly seems worn. Playing harmonica for curious geese, sassy crows heckle my notes. A row of blue spots fanned across black velvet. Hi, butterfly coquette. My lover strides out of the surf, smiling at her- self for getting wet. Ocean, give me strength. I’ll submit to your green pulse.
